channel.title: Publishing on mémgyár

item.title: Publishing to Maven Central in 2025
item.description: The process of publishing artifacts to Maven Central Repository is well documented, but important information are scattered throughout the web and there are some caveats. This guide focuses on publishing a library using Gradle. The steps will be the same for Java, Kotlin (also Multiplatform) and Android projects as well. This is not a complete guide, rather a collection of gotchas I couldn’t find anywhere else; for the rest of the steps just follow the official guides.
